address: 665 9th Ave, New York, NY 10036, United States
name: Galaxy Diner

reviews.review: Loved it! Great food - I had the brunch breakfast taco - lovely atmosphere. Quick service.
Muy Rico! Precio razonable dos das comiendo ah y todo muy bueno... El wrap de chorizo con guacamole lo mejorque prob!
Really enjoyed the meatloaf sandwich.
Good food and friendly service
Decent diner breakfast food. The home fries were delicious but the rest was standard fare.
Great food variety,  very tasty.No child portions but they will split portions into two plates.  Friendly staff
I have been in NYC for 3 days and i have come here to eat twice.   Great food.  The staff is very friendly. If are in the Hell's Kitchen area, come here.  It is worth every penny
I like it

This place is completely disgusting. If you are a women I beg you not to go here. The employees made me and my friends feel very unsafe. One of them looked under my friends skirt it was completely disgusting. They were making comments with
Was very good. needed to eat something quickly before I had to be somewhere and they served me fast, and the food was on point.
Amazing staff front and back of the house. Impeccable service, great food selections at very good prices. My go to place for every week!!
The food was just okay the service was quick.
Great staff
Great service, prices, and lots of shakes and juices

The manager was very accomodating.  Was at a neighboring facility that could only accomodate our group on a hot summer day.  We has 2 elderly party members and needed a quick change.  Walked into restaurant and explained scenario and

Traditional diner and a really good one. Ultra-fast service. This is a really big place inside, so don't let a wait put you off - they will move fast. Great and complete menu. Food is very good. I'll be back
I'm picky about my turkey bacon, and theirs was like card board. The sandwich itself was presented nicely. The coffee was horrible, and my credit card was charged a different price from my receipt.
I love their Greek Salad!  Coconut shrimps and the mini crab cakes are amazing ! Great costumer service.

Amazing service!! My first time in NYC and they were so welcoming and respectful. They have great deals too for Hell's Kitchen.. It has such a relaxing air to it and the people are wonderful! I definitely recommend it
Crazy busy!! Food was killer though!!!
Love this little diner in the heart of Manhatten! Great breakfast and dinner menus!!!
solid portions, filling meals, milkshakes are really good.
Excelent food . Great prices. Awesome service.
Good prices, great brunch and I had a salad once and it was good also!
Quick service. Kind, attentive, personable staff! And delicious pancakes!
Food was fresh and great service.Place was clean and prices were fair.

Extraordinary. Meets an gentry standard by which you judge all other restaurants. The staff is always ready to help, the premises are extremely clean, the atmosphere is lovely, and the food is both delicious and beautifully presented.
I like a good cup of coffee and they got it. N

I liked it. Good brunch and breakfast options. I had pancakes, 2 eggs scrambled, bacon, and coffee. Pancakes were very good, your standard medium size, eggs were good, bacon was ok. Coffee was adequate. Good wide options on food. Decent people watching. In a quiet area near the middle of Hell's Kitchen.
Pretty basic to low quality food with poor service and prices that are not so low

My daughter and I dined here almost 2 years ago with a friend of mine, and my daughter requested we went back for her birthday today.  Problem was we couldn't recall what it was called.  All we knew was we had been to the M&M store prior to
Excelent Mexican food!!

The food was below average, the fried chicken stake was extremely dry, the burger was bland while the Philly cheese stake was salty (3 different dishes), and when I told that to the waiter who asked us how the food was, he just laughed. :)
the owner was friendly and attentive food came out fast . great portions and hot coffee can't ask for more.
If it weren't for the accounts that change according to who you need, during the day it's ok but not in the evening.San Pellegrino water is excellent for the rest they do what they can
Actually had to get up and pour my own coffee several times due to the fact that staff was sparse
Wonderful ambience, large plates and helpful service. Good coffee to go with brunch too!
Food was good, service was good. Nothing was amazing but nothing was bad. Portions were big.
Food is okay
Yummy
The pasta is delicious, excellent service.
It's a diner but you can tell a chef works here.  The food is exceptional.   Great staff.
A very American-style diner, I really liked the food. recommendable
Amazing breakfast and nice service
Amazing food. Amazing service. Very busy, but we lacked nothing. Definitely will go back.
I loved the restaurant .. delicious breakfast, excellent and fast service ... I will be back tomorrow for another Omelet

The food is excellent, great taste great price. I am so happy they are opened. I enjoy eating the meals at Galaxy Diner more than my meals at home. I am delighted with their take out meals. My favorite brunch meal to dine in or take out,
nice
The food was good
I dont know why but i didnt like the food! My friends and I went there for breakfast i ended up not eating anything there. Being honest i gave 3 stars  because my friends like it.
I love this place! Food is excellent and served are fast and efficient
Slow service...ok food
Excelent service and quality good. Mimosas are the best. Highly recommend
Friendly, fast service and reasonably priced for standard fare of breakfast.
Simply the best
Incredible smoothies, got the Hawaiian HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. Great breakfast spot.
Terrible service, a really long wait. French toast was pretty much just bread
Cant go wrong with breakfast . Great portions as well
One of my favorite Restaurants upon Theater Row.  The Food is very good.
Great breakfast! Staff extremely accomodating
Love the staffFood was Delicious
Food is excellent!
Good New York diner. Nice food and service.  Broad tasty menu. Every thing made to order.
Great food....great service!
Spent well over an hour waiting for two sandwiches. It wasn't busy in the slightest, staff was just MIA. Dismal in all regards
Clean. Fast seating and service. Breakfast was fresh and very affordable.

Great little breakfast spot not far from Times Square but not touristy at all.  Staff were fantastic and food was just what we wanted for a classic Greek style diner! (And the berry smoothie was epic - see pic below, laden with fruit and not artificial sweetened pures)...
Good place for breakfast

We went there on our vacation in NY, great place, great breakfast, so we decided to return the following day,to our dissapointment, terrible service, they left us more than 1/2 hour before someone took our order. I'd go back but I will not hesitate to leave.
Good service the satff is very friendly, good was.well prepare,.i loved the shake , lemonade was not so good, fries uhmm deliciosas , love it
Food is good but the service is frustratingly slow, even when they are not busy. Almost left before the food arrived...

Impressive foods! All my favorite foods were right here! They never fail me on my high expectations. Great interior from the outside until the inside part of the restaurant. They strive to provide us the best service that exceeds our expectations.  I need to come back because it's a good one. Job well done on the presentations.

Food was delicious, mimosas were really good. Friendly staff. They accommodated us party of 8 perfectly. Prompted service. Spent over 2hrs at breakfast and we were not rushed. Will definitely return next time in the city.

Typical diner restaurant. Lots of choice on the menu and we only looked at breakfast ! Food was really quick to arrive and was tasty, with decent sized portions. Friendly waiting staff. Good location a few blocks from Times Square with lower prices to match. Highly recommended.

We were looking for a place near our hotel and found a listing for the Galaxy Diner. Were so glad we did. The food was perfect and the service impeccable. We will definitely eat here again on another trip to NYC. With so many places to try, we dont say that about a lot of NYC restaurants.
Love this Diner. Great food and staff.

This diner has been around for years but has had a marked improvement since it has been taking over by the former staff of Giorgio's which closed on 9th Avenue.Good waiters excellent food and humongous proportions. If you're hungry this is the place to go. Highly recommended.
Out of this world!
Meatloaf was terrible, never go back
Good

Ordered delivery, kept getting told delivery is on its way "driver is just outside", after 2 hours they stopped picking up the phone on me. Very weird and thankfully i didn't get my food with spit in it. Be careful ordering from here
Excellent service. Excellent service
Absolutely delicious food! my favorite thing to order as a kid was the chicken tenders and fries, and not afraid to admit its still something I order sometimes.
The food was impressive and good size portions. Service was superb.

Unfortunately due to the limited movement within the city, the diner was unavailable for sitdown. We ordered take out and the service perfect. Out food was done and ready for us when we got there. The servers was polite and friendly. Definitely my spot for the next few days.
Excellent
Great food,prices and staff.
Very attentive, very clean, the food was delicious and so fresh. Will definitely be going back there.
Great all day breakfast place, plenty of outside seating.Simple everyday fare but executed quite well,available for take out and delivery.One of the better diners this side of Hell's Kitchen.
My hell's kitchen mainstay diner. Always the finest hardworking waiters/waitresses.
Love it
Very friendly and courteous staff, the breakfast burrito was out of this world and the Hawaiian shake was out of this galaxy, no pun intended.
A good classic diner with a really good Chicken Parm dish both gluten free and regular variants.
Always a good experience here..Good solid food, quick service and the owner is a cool guy..Recommended
Good price. Average tasting food.

The food is great here and our Waiter was so friendly. We ordered chicken wings, triple decker and a sundae along with happy hour drinks and everything was delicious and more tasteful than the bars next door! I will be coming back
This place is great. Seevice is amazing, food is great especially for the price.

reviews.user: Long Don Jon Der Gesprchige Guru
reviews.review: when i ate at the galaxy diner, i became aware of the importance of naes, because i became one with the galaxy. i traveled through the stars to distant places, to galaxies that human technology could never reach, saw

Ate brunch after mass on a Sunday. Took a seat outside and the sun was shining too bright for me. The staff was very concerned and tried to help reposition the chairs / tables when opening their cafe umbrellas didn't work
Great
Very nice staff!
Omelettes are ginormous, staff is super friendly. Been going here for the past two years and I've had nothing but good food, good atmosphere, and good people.
Great food and very friendly service! Very respectful of covid guidelines. Recommend.
Great neighborhood diner - particularly for  breakfast.
I wanted takeout food, and I wanted to help struggling restaurants. Big mistake going to Galaxy.The burger was flat, seemed pre-made, and tasteless. The bun was soggy. Ughhj
Owner was very friendly. Staff seemed a little overwhelmed but overall it was a fairly good experience. Food was not as amazing as I had hoped
It's ok

I highly recommend this place. I found this place out of sheer chance. We've ordered food for dinner and breakfast. The attention is very good and fast. I loved the burgers. I noticed that staff members speak English and Spanish. You must taste Nachos!!!
Food was wonderful and at a great price! Servers were very attentive and always made sure I had everything I needed.
Was pretty awesome! Sat at tables on the street with great views. The food was delicious!
Excellent
So good a typical New York breakfast
Friendly service, good food

Ordered the pasta bow tie with salmon on a Friday ,it was delicious and delivered in a timely manner. Did the same meal on a Saturday it came it look like it had been taken off somebody else's plate. It was dry the wrong sauce tasted lousy
Food was really underwhelming

Just ordered through GrubHub for a simple sandwich down the same ave the restaurant is on and it's taking 2 hours. If you guys can't handle the delivery system then let GrubHub handle it. I called the lady that answered didn't even know how

I came here for a couple of times this week after my hotel recommended me this location. I am very happy of their  recommendations because it became one of my favorite places in the city. Thanks guys for the lovely food and service and thank to Teddy's Guide for showing me this location.
We went there for family lunch and we were received with attention. Impeccable lunch and service. Always someone to make sure everything is perfect. Service
Great place to go. You can Create your own omelette for breakfast. Awesome!!! It's  must

The food and service was amazing. My husband ordered the fettuccine alfredo with chicken and I had very low expectations. Boy was I wrong! The grilled chicken on top was full of flavor and juicy. I had the patty melt and it was delicious. We will definitely be back many times this week. Highly recommend this place!

The milkshakes and smoothies are amazing. There was a lot of people but we didn't wait at all. The staff are working very fast and they are very accommodating and attentive. Very nice spot, I recommend it to everyone. Shout out to my hotel for recommending me this restaurant.
Great breakfast variety menu
Good food and service

Ive been having breakfast here every weekend for years. The staff knows my order.  For me that says a lot about a restaurant in NYC.I always get the breakfast croissant, its an egg sandwich with feta and
The blueberry pancakes, while expensive, are so good here! The people are friendly and it's a solid New York diner.
Fantastic!! Amazing food. All staff were attentive to us and obviously happy to be there. Food came quickly & all 4 of us loved what we got.
This place is everything.  You literally can't go wrong.  Open 24/7 and great prices,  friendly staff, it's the best.

Well staffed diner with a bar. Food is average. Banana nut pancakes were good. Turkey club was ok and included sliced fresh cooked Turkey but it was dry. Fries add on for $3.00 should be more fries I thought.
Great service, great prices. Would thoroughly recommend
Awesome Diner, best pancakes and bacon, so fluffy. Great service, coffee keeps coming, friendly and warm. Highly recommended
The BEST watermelon sangria!!! Great appetizers also.  Very close to the Puerto Rican Traveling Theater

Standard good quality diner. If you want takeout, you order it near the back at the long counter's end. The Philly cheesesteak is NOT the same thing as the Philadelphia classic chopped meat sub, totally different, be warned.
Typical american dinner,  friendly staff and clean restaurant.  The food came in good time, generous portions and hot. Our boys particularly enjoyed the pancakes.
Delicious food, good service and very fair prices for New York! Clear recommendation!
Food and service is excellent
We went there to eat a good evening and a midday, and to eat well
Good food but the first diner I've ever been to that didn't have biscuits and gravy.
Great little dinner and not many left in midtown
Great diner for a quick breakfast! Give it a look!
Best New York breakfast ever
I had a pretty good omelette packed with veggies. Good coffee. My S.O. did not enjoy her French toast though.
A quiet diner, helpful people. Good variety of tortillas, very rich sausages and coffee. Good quantity / price
Showed up with 4 adults all with big luggage on a busy Sunday morning. They just made it work. No wait. Friendly service. Good food. Just wish they had home made corn beef hash!
Very good option if you are looking for a huge breakfast.

We just happened to come across their menu at a local hotel. The wide variety of food offered was attraction immediately. The atmosphere is very homely and inviting. Great service and good food for the price.

We stopped here on our way to a musical and we were not disappointed. The staff was super attentive and friendly and even accommodating when we asked to change sections to sit in the back. The ceiling is painted like tha galaxy and the
My carrot, apple, ginger juice was awesome! They also have great waffles
Classic dinner. Good for sitting and chatting with lots of cholesterol!
Good breakfast cooks. Friendly staff.
Good food and economical
Waiter was kind enough to check if items had dairy or eggs. He even showed me the package ingredient list to confirm. A+
A classy dinner: good coffee, great vibe, delicious breakfast/comfort food
Great service, good food

We were checking out the menu while looking for a breakfast place and another couple going in told us we had to eat here, so we did and the food was awesome. I had bacon, eggs, homemade potatoes and toast and my daughter had a croissant and
Great place for breakfast while New York and reasonable prices.
I loved this place. Relaxed family feel. Good honest food. Great service. We had breakfast here every morning. Great coffee always being topped up too. Thoroughly recommend.
Friendly staff and good food at reasonable prices...
Low waiting Time for the food and it wasn't worth the money we paid for.

We stopped here for lunch. Both myself and my husband had the garlic bread steak sandwich and fries. It was delicious. The place was clean, busy and everyone was very friendly. Would have given 5 stars but the service let it down very slightly and the price.
Great food and service! Very clean as well!!
Very cute diner with traditional classics and new flavors alike
We had breakfast sandwiches and fresh juice. Both were delicious. Prices were reasonable and staff was very friendly. Would definitely go back!
Great small diner. Food was average but quite good and we were filled.Service was very good, attentiveness was high. Felt family owned and showed in
Fills the spot. Ask for organic oats and milk. Great to settle the stomach

We have had breakfast, lunch and dinner at the Galaxy Diner, as well as a cake and coffee stop. Each time the waiters have been so warm and welcoming, a rarity in NY. Don't hesitate to visit this place. Thank you for the relaxed atmosphere and good food! A family of tourists who have been staying in Hells Kitchen for 3 weeks.
Helias was so friendly as the Greeks only knows how to be... food also great and the service excellent!!! I suggest it definitely!!!
Food was great. Owner and/or manager was really nice. Service was great

We are here on vacation from Phoenix for  Christmas and New Year's. We had left the museum headed for another restaurant when we seen The Galaxy Diner and decided to try it instead. The staff was amazing and attentive and the appetizers and

I was looking for a diner bit apart from the rush of Times Square, only 2 blocks away and got all I need,  compact size, with no lines, abundant hot and delicious food; Quick service and again delicious. I stayed 1 week there and I went 5 times.
Excellent
Excellent food, attention and price, an excellent place to eat tasty yet good price in Midtown Manhattan New York, I highly recommend them.
They prepare any dish since there work people from various parts of the world and can comment with the chefs your craving

Stopped by in the morning for breakfast.  They are very attentive.  Food was good and though it was a very cold morning inside was very warm and comfortable.  If your in the area and are looking for breakfast please consider this place.

The service was good however I couldn't say the same about the breakfast that I had there. The omelet that I had was dry and overcooked. The cheese like substance on top of it was barely melted and tasted like one of those sliced cellophane
Loved it!
Great little Hidden Gem hole in the wall with good food. We have eaten there several times on this trip for breakfast and dinner. Good food and service.
Today, a group of people in table #8 left me an unexpected Christmas gift. They were 5 adults and a baby, you know who you guys are, thank you very much, and Happy Holidays.
Great value for money..popular venue
Good food, lots of choice. Nice setting, good service. Reasonable prices. I had an omelet with tomatoes, red onion, salmon. Some potato thing and a toasted sesame bagel. Wife had corn beef hash.
Overpriced and bland.
Recommended by a guy stood outside, and he was right! Very good food and friendly staff
Delicious Southern grilled cheese sandwich and friendly waiters.
You will love the food here, if you love food
Great food, brilliant service and vegan option not a problem.
Relaxing break 5 @ 7. Relax, without pressure. Really appreciated.Relax break happy hour. Really appreciated.

Plenty of choice for breakfast whilst staying in an hotel that didn't provide that facility. Staff were friendly efficient & very accommodating. Exceptionally busy at weekends but they didn't turn anyone away just had to wait.
It's OK, not much more than that. Coffee was so so and the breakfast was cold when served.

Fine restaurant, nothing exceptional but had all the normal breakfast variety. Many milkshakes and smoothies. Very crowded on a sunday but they kept the wait pretty short. We were not waited on very quickly but we are also not in a hurry. Good local spot!
The pancakes are SO fluffy and the juice is homemade. Quick service, too.
It's a diner. It's fine.
Great

I had been a longtime customer at Galaxy, even patronizing the Chelsea location.But the manager, who was rude and creepy, doesn't appreciate such a customer. I now patronize other diners in Hell's Kitchen.
One of my favorite diners in NYC. You're never pressured to leave, even if you're just having a cup of coffee. And you can get pretty much anything to eat here! Including smoothies!
